channel.title: [Fixed] Some Issues Have Been Fixed [Fixed]
channel.description: Thank you for your help, guys. Some issues have been fixed; there are only a few errors left. Please check [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666818.0.html]this new thread[/url] for more details.

item.title: [Fixed] Some Issues Have Been Fixed [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

His command wasn’t a copy and paste. You have to rename some variables in it to make it work properly…

Read full topic

item.title: [Fixed] Some Issues Have Been Fixed [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

This is the error I get in the compiler when I put that in:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:91: error: cannot find symbol if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ ^ symbol: variable command location: class Commands src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:91: error: cannot find symbol if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ ^ symbol: variable playerRights location: class Commands src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:92: error: cannot find symbol int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); ^ symbol: variable command location: class Commands src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:93: error: cannot find symbol extraCb += combat; ^ symbol: variable extraCb location: class Commands src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:94: error: cannot find symbol updateRequired = true; ^ symbol: variable updateRequired location: class Commands src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:95: error: cannot find symbol appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ symbol: variable appearanceUpdateRequired location: class Commands Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [Fixed] Some Issues Have Been Fixed [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I could have been an asshole and just throw in a LMGTFY link. But eh. This should work.

if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){
int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
extraCb += combat;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
